header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Full-stack software engineer with 6+ years building high-scale distributed systems and real-time applications serving millions of users. Proven expertise developing REST APIs, streaming data platforms, and responsive web applications. Strong background in microservices architecture, database design, and contributing to engineering projects from conception to deployment. Passionate about leveraging technology to build socially impactful solutions.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Architected and maintained a high-throughput streaming data platform serving 50+ engineering teams, processing millions of real-time events with robust error handling and monitoring systems
Developed comprehensive REST APIs and microservices architecture supporting Disney+ and Hulu content delivery, implementing sophisticated validation and compatibility checking systems
Built state management systems enabling teams to maintain application state from event streams, successfully integrated into content metadata systems processing large-scale entertainment data
Implemented multi-language code generation pipelines with automated JSON serialization, supporting development teams across multiple programming ecosystems including Python, Java, and Scala
Designed complex CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions with automated testing, validation, and deployment processes ensuring reliable releases across distributed services
Collaborated closely with product managers and architectural teams to identify potential technical barriers and deliver scalable solutions impacting millions of streaming users

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer

Built a comprehensive HTTP management API enabling secure key rotation, transaction signing, and node configuration
Architected a high-performance transaction streaming service with real-time querying capabilities, utilizing MongoDB for efficient data indexing and retrieval operations
Developed a React user interface providing transaction monitoring and blockchain data visualization capabilities for supply chain tracking applications
Mentored junior developers and took ownership of system components from initial design through production deployment and ongoing maintenance

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II

Collaborated with product teams to proactively identify technical challenges and delivered features that streamlined construction project workflows for thousands of active users

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
